bibl.title: An Early Roman Application for Lease of a Date Crop (P. Duk. inv. 85) and the 'Six-Choinix Measure of the Hermeneus'.
bibl.note: P. Duke Inv. 85 (Bakchias (?), 14 CE). - The 'six-choinix measure of the Hermeneus'. - Choinix measures. - Interpreters, regulators, middlemen.
bibl.seg: MAIRS Rachel, An Early Roman Application for Lease of a Date Crop (P. Duk. inv. 85) and the 'Six-Choinix Measure of the Hermeneus'.
P. Duke Inv. 85 (Bakchias (?), 14 CE). - The 'six-choinix measure of the Hermeneus'. - Choinix measures. - Interpreters, regulators, middlemen.
